Security Analyst - Blue Team is part of our Information Security Department who is responsible for cyber attacks. On a daily basis, our Blue Team will continuously detect, analyze, investigate and prevent any security incidents. Security Analyst will also work together to decide each phase of an incident and respond appropriately. In addition, the incumbent must have a passion for learning and proactively develop themselves within the ever-growing startup company like FinAccel. Last but not least, he/she will collaborate with the pentester (red team) in developing strategies to minimize security risks in infrastructure or/and applications owned by FinAccel.

column2: • To install and analyze suspicious traffic.
• Manage cloud-based WAF: Implementation and Configuration
• Protect, analyze, and investigate security incidents.
• Has knowledge in doing malware analysis (Both on network and application)
• Determine the requirements needed to build security monitoring tools.
• Experienced working in security for blue team for at least 2 years, most favorably in startup working environment.
• Experienced in managing and supporting cloud-based WAF, anti DDoS systems, and security monitoring tools (SIEM, Log Management, etc.)
• Have experience in implementing and operating commonly used security monitoring tools such as for example one of: Cloudflare, Elastic, CloudTrail, AlienVault USM, and InsightIDR (Rapid7).
• Have experience in building security services in complex environmental systems.
• Strong Log Management, Aggregation, and Analysis Skills
• Good English proficiency
• Able to work in a team and learn fast

column1:
Algoritma,"Professional Training","Data Science Trainee","Menara Kadin, 5th Floor, Jakarta Selatan 12950, Indonesia","Full time",,"Bachelor's Degree","Entry Level / Junior, Apprentice","

Are you looking to build a career in data science and make a positive impact on others? Algoritma was founded in 2017 to make data science skills accessible to everybody. We organize corporate training, programming workshops, and data science bootcamps that adopt a learn-by-building approach suited to beginners and non-programmers. We are seeking passionate and motivated individuals to join our team as Data Science Instructors. As a member of our team, you will have the opportunity to improve your own skills in R, Python, and SQL while helping our students acquire employable data science skills through our intensive development program. The development program aims to equip successful candidates with the required skills to become Data Science Instructors while helping our Students acquire employable Data Science Skills.

At Algoritma, we believe in the power of education to transform lives. That's why we offer corporate training, programming workshops, and data science bootcamps that are accessible to beginners and non-programmers, using a learn-by-building approach. As a Data Science Trainee, you'll be responsible for completing this development program, maintaining our class management system, and answering online mentor support inquiries from our clients. You'll also assist the lead instructor in conducting workshops, tracking attendance, and ensuring logistics and venue preparation. Plus, you'll have the chance to contribute to the development of Algoritma's educational content and tools, helping to improve our team's pedagogical excellence.

If you're committed to lifelong learning and want to make a difference in the lives of others through data science education, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity at Algoritma. Join our team and start building a rewarding career today.

column2: • Complete the Data Science Trainee development program Algoritma Instructor and Course Producer designed.
• Responsible for maintaining Algoritma's Class Management System to meet the SLA for student assignment grading.
• Responsible for answering online mentor support service for all Algoritma clients in answering technical data-science-related questions.
• Assist the lead instructor in conducting a workshop as a teaching assistant.
• Responsible for tracking attendance, ensuring logistics and venue preparation, and solving technical problems.
• Contribute to developing Algoritma educational content in data science for a network of Alumni or Corporate Clients.
• Contribute to Algoritma's tools development for analyzing and improving the team's pedagogical excellence.
• Bachelor's degree in areas related to but not limited to Mathematics, Computer Science, and Information Technology will be an advantage.
• Displaying a solid interest in mastering full-stack data scientist state-of-the-art practice is a must.
• Highly enthusiastic about data analytics.
• Experience in data analysis, data mining, and machine learning projects will be a plus.
• Exposed to statistical tools, computational programming, database management, or software engineering.
• Experienced with R or Python.

FinAccel,"Financial Services","Security Engineer - Red Team","Dipo Tower, Jl. Gatot Subroto No.Kav 50-52, RW.7, Petamburan, Kecamatan Tanah Abang, Jakarta, Daerah Khusus Ibukota Jakarta 10260","Full time",,"Bachelor's Degree","Mid-Senior Level / Manager","

Security Engineer - Red Team is part of our Information Security Department who is responsible for cyber attacks. On a daily basis, our Red Team will continuously detect, analyze, and find security gaps in Finaccel's systems (Infrastructure & Application). Security Engineer - Red Team must have extensive knowledge in vulnerability assessment and penetration testing. In addition, the incumbent must have a passion for learning and proactively develop themselves within the ever-growing startup company like FinAccel.

Last but not least, the incumbent will collaborate with security analyst and security engineer - blue team in developing strategies to minimize security risks in infrastructure or/and applications owned by FinAccel.

column2: • Perform vulnerability assessments and penetration testing, both on infrastructure, mobile applications, and web applications.
• Conduct security reviews from the perspective of external attackers (hackers).
• Generate reports on the results of security assessments, both from the results of vulnerability scanning and penetration testing.
• Conduct an examination of the security vulnerabilities found and help provide mitigation suggestions for the discovered vulnerabilities.
• Have 3+ years of experience doing penetration testing on system infrastructure, mobile apps, and web apps.
• Have knowledge of hacking techniques on system infrastructure, mobile apps, and web apps.
• Having an understanding of hacking techniques is not only limited to using tools, but is able to understand the hacking process manually.
• Understand standards and frameworks for vulnerability scanning and penetration testing processes such as OSSTMM, OWASP, PTES, etc.

Rakamin Academy,"Education Management","Product Engineer Frontend","Kantorkuu Coworking Dan Office Space Agro, Jalan Yasmin Raya, RT06/RW04, Kuningan Timur Kel., Setia Budi, Jakarta Selatan, 12950, Indonesia","Full time",6000000,"Bachelor's Degree","Associate / Supervisor","

About the Job

You'll be building new product features alongside a designer and product manager using our Agile methodology, as well as addressing issues to ensure our apps are robust and our codebase is clean. As a Product Engineer, you'll write clean, efficient code to enhance our product's codebase in meaningful ways.

Our teams are always working on our education service -- Rakamin Academy, to provide a better learning experience. We're also actively developing a new line of products called Rakamin Career Solution, an end-to-end Recruitment 360 Platform with ATS and assessment ready. Our web app is built as a majestic monolith using React JS combined with SSR in a few features.
Here are some real examples of the work in our team:

column2: • Collaborating with backend engineers and 3rd parties to create highly configurable platforms and cross-platform integration.
• Building design systems and scalable components with product designers following design language to achieve our branding purpose to provide an end-to-end workforce ecosystem.
• Strengthening our test coverage with Playwright to make robust and reliable web apps.
• Improving our web app performance to meet world-class standards.
• Conducting full product lifecycles, from idea generation to design, implementation, testing, deployment, and maintenance.
• Providing input on technical feasibility, timelines, and potential product trade-offs, working with business divisions.
• Actively engaging with users and stakeholders to understand their needs and translate them into product improvements.

column1: Our benefits support a life well-lived away from work. Ample time off and all the resources you need to support you in doing the best work of your career:

column2: • Paid time off: Rakamin offers 17 days of vacation and personal days. You can take a day off without any specific reason, whether you want to hang out, take a vacation, or just lay in bed.
• Device ownership: We provide a Rp7 million budget per year so you can purchase any device to support your productivity.
• Learning benefits with total Rp23 million per year:
• Rp6 million per year to subscribe to courses, buy books, or any resources you need to boost your skills and knowledge.

• O'Reilly subscription worth Rp8 million per year — We subscribe to O'Reilly for you so you can read the newest books, videos, conferences, and courses related to technology, data, design, business, and soft skills.
• Access to all our learning module Bootcamps and Short Courses worth Rp15 million per year, so you can always upskill and reskill for a better life and career.

column1: We're looking for candidates with a strong track record of bringing JS web apps to life.
You should have experience with JS libraries and frameworks (React, Angular, Vue), as well as modern frontend tooling and technologies such as:

column2: • State management
• Build tools
• Module bundlers
• Testing frameworks
• CSS processors
• Progressive web apps
• Server-side rendering and static site generators
• Frontend performance optimization techniques
• Accessibility and cross-browser compatibility
• RESTful APIs

column1: Since much of our work is written — from the code and interfaces we design to the pull request discussions and long-form proposals we make — being a good writer is important. Effective, concise writing leads to effective, concise code.

We're not big on credentials, so a Computer Science degree or graduating from a prestigious university isn't something we emphasize. We care about what you can do and how you do it, not how you got here.

While you'll report to a CTO directly, Rakamin is a company where Managers of One thrive. We're quick to trust that you can do it, and here to support you. You can expect to be counted on and do your best work and build a career here.

This is a remote job. You're free to work where you work best: home office, co-working space, coffee shops. To ensure time zone overlap with our current team and maintain well communication, we're only looking for people based in Indonesia.

OONA Insurance Indonesia,Insurance,"Claim Handler Kendaraan Bermotor","Jalan Jenderal Sudirman, Senayan Kel., Kebayoran Baru","Full time",,"Bachelor's Degree","Entry Level / Junior, Apprentice","

Motor Vehicle Claim Handler bertanggung jawab dalam mengelola dan memproses klaim yang terkait dengan kecelakaan atau insiden kendaraan bermotor. Peran utama mereka adalah menilai klaim, menyelidiki keadaan seputar kejadian, dan menentukan tingkat cakupan dan tanggung jawab sesuai dengan kebijakan asuransi yang berlaku.
Berikut adalah tanggung jawab utama seorang penangan klaim kendaraan bermotor:

column2: • Penilaian Klaim: Meninjau dan mengevaluasi klaim asuransi kendaraan bermotor, memastikan kelengkapan dan keakuratan klaim. Menentukan batas cakupan, jumlah potongan premi, dan syarat-syarat kebijakan yang berlaku untuk setiap klaim.

• Penyelidikan: Menyelidiki keadaan kecelakaan atau insiden kendaraan bermotor dengan mengumpulkan informasi, seperti laporan polisi, keterangan saksi, dan foto. Menilai tanggung jawab dan mengidentifikasi adanya penipuan atau penyajian informasi yang salah.

• Komunikasi: Berinteraksi dengan pemegang polis, penggugat klaim, saksi, dan pihak terkait lainnya untuk mengumpulkan informasi tambahan, menjelaskan proses klaim, dan menjawab pertanyaan. Memberikan pembaruan tentang status klaim dan menjawab permintaan informasi.

• Dokumentasi dan Pencatatan: Menyimpan catatan terperinci tentang semua aktivitas yang berkaitan dengan klaim, termasuk korespondensi, keterangan, dan hasil penyelidikan. Menyiapkan dan mempertahankan laporan dan berkas klaim yang akurat.

• Evaluasi Kerusakan: Menilai tingkat kerusakan kendaraan dan berkoordinasi dengan bengkel perbaikan atau penaksir untuk memperkirakan biaya perbaikan. Menentukan apakah perbaikan layak dan diperlukan, dengan mempertimbangkan syarat-syarat kebijakan dan batas cakupan.

• Negosiasi dan Penyelesaian: Bernegosiasi untuk menyelesaikan klaim dengan penggugat klaim, memastikan kompensasi yang adil dalam batas kebijakan dan hukum yang berlaku. Mempertimbangkan faktor-faktor seperti biaya pengobatan, kerusakan properti, penghasilan yang hilang, dan kerugian lain yang relevan.

• Pencegahan Penipuan: Mengidentifikasi klaim yang berpotensi palsu dengan menganalisis inkonsistensi, melakukan penyelidikan, dan bekerjasama dengan unit atau lembaga anti-penipuan khusus. Melaporkan kegiatan yang diduga merupakan penipuan kepada otoritas yang berwenang.

• Kepatuhan: Mematuhi peraturan industri asuransi, kebijakan perusahaan, dan persyaratan hukum selama proses penanganan klaim. Memastikan bahwa semua tindakan dan keputusan sesuai dengan standar etika.

• Layanan Pelanggan: Memberikan layanan pelanggan yang luar biasa dengan responsif, empatik, dan informatif selama proses klaim. Menanggapi kekhawatiran, memberikan panduan, dan menyelesaikan masalah untuk menjaga kepuasan pelanggan.
• Sarjana (S1)
• Memiliki pengalaman dibidang yang sama minimal 2 tahun
• Memiliki pengetahuan yang berkaitan dengan bagian-bagian kendaraan
• Dapat menggunakan aplikasi atau sytem untuk survey

PT Bank Central Asia Tbk,"Financial Services","Relationship Officer","Central Jakarta, DKI Jakarta, Indonesia","Full time",,"Bachelor's Degree","Entry Level / Junior, Apprentice","

BCA turut berperan penting dalam kemajuan perekonomian negara dengan memberikan dukungan finansial bagi masyarakat khususnya nasabah. Untuk mewujudkan kepercayaan penuh nasabah, BCA senantiasa memberikan dukungan finansial bagi nasabah melalui solusi-solusi perbankan yang sesuai dengan kebutuhan mereka. Untuk itu lah Relationship Officer BCA berperan untuk memastikan nasabah mendapatkan solusi keuangan yang sesuai dengan kebutuhan para nasabah termasuk melakukan analisa kelayakan kredit bagi calon debitur.

BCA mempersiapkan program pelatihan yang intensif selama 1 tahun agar para Relationship Officer dapat menjalankan perannya dengan optimal. Lulusan Program Relationship officer akan di angkat langsung menjadi karyawan tetap di kantor cabang BCA. Selama pelatihan, peserta akan mendapatkan uang saku, jaminan kesehatan, tunjangan hari raya, tunjangan akhir tahun dan tentunya pelatihan yang berkualitas dari BCA.

Itsavirus,Internet,"Senior Back End Developer",,"Full time",,"Bachelor's Degree","Mid-Senior Level / Manager","

Summary

You will work with upper management to define software requirements and take the lead on operational and technical projects. In this role, you should be able to work independently with little supervision. You should have excellent organization and problem-solving skills. If you also have hands-on experience in software development and agile methodologies, we’d like to meet you.
Your goal will be to develop high-quality software that is aligned with user needs and business goals.

column2: • Develop high-quality software design and architecture
• Identify, prioritize and execute tasks in the software development life cycle
• Develop tools and applications by producing clean, efficient code
• Automate tasks through appropriate tools and scripting
• Review and debug code
• Translating business rules into technical implementation
• Perform validation and verification testing
• Collaborate with internal teams and vendors to fix and improve products
• Document development phases and monitor systems
• Ensure software is up-to-date with latest technologies
• Candidate possesses at least a Diploma, Bachelor's Degree in Engineering (Computer Science).
• Required language(s): Bahasa Indonesia, English.
• Preferably 2-5 years experience in software development.
• Deep knowledge of version control systems (Git or SVN).

Home Credit Indonesia,"Hi-Tech Financial Services","Finance Business Partner","Plaza Oleos, South Jakarta, DKI Jakarta, Indonesia","Full time",,"Bachelor's Degree","Mid-Senior Level / Manager","

Finance Business Partnering mission is to align financial expertise with strategic business goals to drive performance, enhance decision-making, and contribute to overall organizational success. Finance business partnering goes beyond traditional financial roles and focuses on building collaborative relationships between finance professionals and other departments within an organization. Here are key elements that constitute the mission of finance business partnering:

column2: • Strategic Alignment: Finance business partners work closely with business units to understand their strategic objectives.
• Informed Decision-Making: Finance business partners provide valuable insights and data-driven analysis to support decision-making across the organization.

• Value Creation: The mission of finance business partnering is to create value beyond traditional financial reporting. Finance professionals actively seek opportunities to optimize processes, reduce costs, and identify revenue-generating initiatives to contribute to the organization's growth and profitability.
• Cross-Functional Collaboration: Finance business partners collaborate across various departments, fostering strong relationships with non-financial stakeholders.
• Performance Measurement: Finance business partners develop and implement key performance indicators (KPIs) that align with strategic objectives.
• Risk Management: Finance business partners actively participate in identifying and mitigating financial risks
• Communication and Education: The mission includes effective communication of financial information to non-financial stakeholders.

• Adaptability and Innovation: Finance business partners strive to stay ahead of industry trends and technological advancements. They bring innovative solutions to financial challenges, driving efficiency and effectiveness in financial processes
• At least 6 years’ experience in a Business Partnering/FP&A. Preferably in the financial services or banking industry
• A strong commercial finance leader with demonstrated experience leading a diverse and talented team
• A motivated individual, who can work autonomously
• Excellent communication skills with the ability to build strong relationships across the business at all levels
• Problem solving skills, capable of maintaining accuracy and attention to detail whilst under pressure and meeting strict deadlines
• Business partnering and managing forecasts experience
• Strong business acumen and commercial interest in the business
• Stakeholder engagement and well-developed influencing skills
• Advanced Excel skills and systems experience

column2: • Mengidentifikasi Peluang Bisnis: Menganalisis pasar dan mengidentifikasi peluang bisnis potensial untuk pertumbuhan dan ekspansi MCN.
• Penyusunan Rencana Bisnis: Merencanakan strategi bisnis jangka panjang dan jangka pendek untuk mencapai tujuan perusahaan.
• Mencari Mitra Strategis: Mencari dan menjalin hubungan dengan mitra potensial, seperti merek, agensi pemasaran, atau influencer, untuk kerjasama dan kemitraan yang saling menguntungkan.
• Negosiasi dan Penandatanganan Kesepakatan: Menegosiasikan kesepakatan bisnis dengan mitra potensial dan mengurus proses penandatanganan kontrak. Membangun dan
• Memelihara Hubungan Bisnis: Menjaga hubungan yang baik dengan mitra bisnis yang sudah ada dan memastikan kepuasan mereka dengan layanan MCN.
• Riset Pasar: Melakukan riset pasar untuk memahami tren industri dan kebutuhan pasar yang berkembang, serta menggunakan data tersebut untuk menginformasikan strategi bisnis.
• Pemasaran dan Promosi: Mengembangkan strategi pemasaran untuk mempromosikan layanan dan produk MCN kepada klien dan mitra potensial.
• Pengembangan Produk: Berkolaborasi dengan tim internal untuk mengembangkan dan meningkatkan layanan dan produk MCN sesuai dengan kebutuhan pasar.
• Pencapaian Target Bisnis: Bertanggung jawab atas pencapaian target bisnis yang ditetapkan oleh manajemen dan berkontribusi pada pertumbuhan bisnis MCN TikTok.
• Minimal S1 dari segala jurusan
• Pengalaman: Pengalaman sebelumnya dalam pengembangan bisnis, pemasaran digital, atau hubungan mitra sangat dihargai.
• Pemahaman tentang TikTok: Pengetahuan mendalam tentang platform TikTok, algoritma, dan tren konten yang sedang populer di platform tersebut.
• Kemampuan Komunikasi: Kemampuan komunikasi yang baik, baik secara lisan maupun tulisan, untuk berinteraksi dengan klien dan mitra potensial.
• Analisis Data: Kemampuan untuk menganalisis data pasar dan kinerja bisnis untuk mengidentifikasi peluang dan menginformasikan keputusan strategis.
• Kreativitas: Kemampuan untuk berpikir kreatif dan menciptakan strategi bisnis yang inovatif untuk mencapai tujuan perusahaan.
• Kemampuan Negosiasi: Kemampuan untuk menegosiasikan kesepakatan dengan mitra potensial dan mengelola hubungan bisnis dengan baik.
• Networking: Kemampuan untuk membangun dan memelihara jaringan yang kuat dengan mitra bisnis dan pihak terkait lainnya.
• Bahasa: Kemampuan berbicara dalam bahasa yang relevan dengan pasar atau mitra yang dituju, terutama jika MCN TikTok beroperasi di berbagai negara atau wilayah.
• Motivasi dan Antusiasme: Antusiasme yang tinggi terhadap industri media sosial dan TikTok, serta kemauan untuk terus belajar dan beradaptasi dengan perubahan dalam industri.
• Kemampuan Kerja Tim: Kemampuan untuk bekerja dalam tim dengan berbagai departemen dalam perusahaan untuk mencapai tujuan bersama.
• Kemampuan Penjualan: Kemampuan untuk menjual visi dan nilai MCN kepada klien dan mitra potensial.

Nomura Research Institute Indonesia,"Information Technology / IT","Machine Learning Engineer (MLE)","Sahid Sudirman Center, Jl.Jend.Sudirman Kav.86","Full time",12000000,"Bachelor's Degree","Associate / Supervisor","

A Machine Learning Engineer trains, validates and evaluates machine learning and deep learning models which perform predictive tasks in various domains such as computer vision, natural language understanding and time-series analysis. Some examples include visual recognition models, activity detection using sensor data and demand forecasting.

column2: • Translate and refine business goals into appropriate machine learning objectives.
• Design and implement ML/DL solutions and integrate them with various Big Data platforms and architectures.
• Create and maintain ML pipelines that are scalable, robust, and ready for production.
• Collaborate with domain experts, software developers, and data scientists.
• Troubleshoot ML/DL model issues, including recommendations for retrain, re-validate, and improvements/optimization.
• Hands-on experience in building ML models deployed into real-world business applications or research.
• Working knowledge of ML/DL algorithms (classification, regression, clustering, hyperparameter tuning, etc).
• Proficiency with Python and libraries for machine learning such as scikit-learn and pandas.
• Good understanding of Deep learning frameworks such as Tensorflow, Keras, PyTorch, MXNet, etc.
• Experience in using computer vision libraries such as OpenCV, PIL.
• Experience working with cloud services platform (AWS or GCP) to build ML/DL pipelines.
• Experience in multi-GPU model training with CUDA.
• Experience in ML experiment tracking tools (e.g. WandB, Neptune, TensorBoard).
• Experience in model deployment using Docker (e.g. AWS SageMaker, Google Kubernetes Engine).
• Experience in model compression or quantization for on-edge-device inference.
• Experience with Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery(CI/CD).
• Relevant certifications in machine learning and cloud technologies (e.g., AWS, Coursera) would be a plus.

PT Bank Central Asia Tbk,"Financial Services","BCA Development Program IT (BDP IT)","Central Jakarta, DKI Jakarta, Indonesia","Full time",,"Bachelor's Degree","Entry Level / Junior, Apprentice","

Perkembangan teknologi yang kian pesat merupakan salah satu tantangan yang harus dihadapi oleh semua perusahaan di Indonesia, termasuk BCA. Menjawab tantangan ini, BCA terus mengedepankan inovasi agar dapat senantiasa menjadi bank yang dapat diandalkan oleh masyarakat. Inovasi yang dilakukan BCA selama ini membutuhkan dukungan dari semua pihak terutama bagian IT.

Untuk mempersiapkan tenaga profesional di bidang IT, BCA secara spesifik merancang program BDP IT. Peserta BDP IT akan mengikuti pelatihan selama 12 bulan di BCA mengenai perbankan dan Information Technologies. Lulusan program ini akan diangkat langsung menjadi karyawan tetap dan ditempatkan di Divisi IT BCA. Selama pelatihan, peserta akan mendapatkan uang saku bulanan, jaminan kesehatan, tunjangan hari raya, tunjangan akhir tahun dan tentunya pelatihan yang berkualitas dari BCA.
Program BDP IT terbuka untuk lowongan berikut:

column1:
Rakamin Academy,"Education Management","Product Engineer Backend","Kantorkuu Coworking Dan Office Space Agro, Jalan Yasmin Raya, RT06/RW04, Kuningan Timur Kel., Setia Budi, Jakarta Selatan, 12950, Indonesia","Full time",6000000,"Bachelor's Degree","Associate / Supervisor","

About the Job

You'll be building new product features alongside a frontend engineer and product manager using our Agile methodology, as well as addressing issues to ensure our apps are robust and our codebase is clean. As a Product Engineer, you'll write clean, efficient code to enhance our product's codebase in meaningful ways.

Our teams are always working on our education service -- Rakamin Academy, to provide a better learning experience. We're also actively developing a new line of products called Rakamin Career Solution, an end-to-end Recruitment 360 Platform with ATS and assessment ready. Our web app is built as a majestic monolith using Ruby on Rails.
Here are some real examples of the work in our team:

column2: • Collaborating with frontend engineers and 3rd parties to build robust backend solutions that support highly configurable platforms and cross-platform integration.
• Developing and maintaining server-side logic for central database, ensuring high performance throughput and response time.
• Writing reusable, testable, and efficient code to improve the functionality of our existing systems.
• Strengthening our test coverage with Rspec to build robust and reliable web apps.
• Conducting full product lifecycles, from idea generation to design, implementation, testing, deployment, and maintenance.
• Providing input on technical feasibility, timelines, and potential product trade-offs, working with business divisions.
• Actively engaging with users and stakeholders to understand their needs and translate them into backend improvements.

column1: Our benefits support a life well-lived away from work. Ample time off and all the resources you need to support you in doing the best work of your career:

column2: • Paid time off: Rakamin offers 17 days of vacation and personal days. You can take a day off without any specific reason, whether you want to hang out, take a vacation, or just lay in bed.
• Device ownership: We provide a Rp7 million budget per year so you can purchase any device to support your productivity.
• Learning benefits with total Rp23 million per year:
• Rp6 million per year to subscribe to courses, buy books, or any resources you need to boost your skills and knowledge.
• Access to all our learning module Bootcamps and Short Courses worth Rp15 million per year, so you can always upskill and reskill for a better life and career.

• O'Reilly subscription worth Rp8 million per year — We subscribe to O'Reilly for you so you can read the newest books, videos, conferences, and courses related to technology, data, design, business, and soft skills.

column1: We're looking for candidates with a strong track record of working on backend technologies of web apps.
You should have experience with backend languages and frameworks (Node.js, Django, Rails), as well as modern backend tooling and technologies such as:

column2: • Database management (like MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB)
• RESTful APIs
• Security Compliance
• Cloud technologies (like AWS, Google Cloud, Azure)
• Server-side languages like Java, Python, Ruby or .NET
• Understanding of frontend technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript)
• Knowledge of user authentication and authorization between multiple systems, servers, and environments
• Understanding fundamental design principles behind a scalable application
• Creating database schemas that represent and support business processes
• Implementing automated testing platforms and unit tests.

column1: Since much of our work is written — from the code and interfaces we design to the pull request discussions and long-form proposals we make — being a good writer is important. Effective, concise writing leads to effective, concise code.

We're not big on credentials, so a Computer Science degree or graduating from a prestigious university isn't something we emphasize. We care about what you can do and how you do it, not how you got here.

While you'll report to a CTO directly, Rakamin is a company where Managers of One thrive. We're quick to trust that you can do it, and here to support you. You can expect to be counted on and do your best work and build a career here.

This is a remote job. You're free to work where you work best: home office, co-working space, coffee shops. To ensure time zone overlap with our current team and maintain well communication, we're only looking for people based in Indonesia.
